message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_QUERY_NOT_SET
message.locale: A query must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_TYPE_NOT_SET
message.locale: A query type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_NAME_NOT_SET
message.locale: A query name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_RAND_PAGE_NAME_NOT_SET
message.locale: If the query type is dynamic, a page name for random case generation must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_MAN_PAGE_NAME_NOT_SET
message.locale: If the query type is dynamic, a page name for manual case search must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_SQL_TEXT_NOT_SET
message.locale: SQL text must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comment entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CRITERIA_NOT_SET
message.locale: Criteria to match the SQL query must be specified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_CANCELLED_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: This selection query has already been canceled and cannot be modified.
This selection query has already been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_ACTIVE_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: This selection query is active and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_PREDEFINED_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: This is a predefined selection query and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_CANCEL_CANCELLED_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: This selection query has already been canceled.
This selection query has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_PUBLISH_CANCELLED_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: This selection query has already been canceled and cannot be published.
This selection query has already been cancelled and cannot be published.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATE_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: An error has occurred validating the selection query: %1s

message.name: ERR_XFV_RANDOM_PAGE_NAME_NOT_REQUIRED
message.locale: Random Generation must not be entered when query type is Fixed.

message.name: ERR_XFV_MANUAL_PAGE_NAME_NOT_REQUIRED
message.locale: Manual Search must not be entered when query type is Fixed.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_CANCEL_ACTIVE_SELECTION_QUERY
message.locale: This selection query is active and cannot be canceled.
This selection query is active and cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_SQL_QUERY_MISSING_INTO_CLAUSE
message.locale: The SQL query must contain an INTO clause.

message.name: ERR_FV_SQL_QUERY_INVALID
message.locale: The SQL query is invalid.
